name: Jeevesh's Email Regex II
content:
Acceptable
---------------
abc1.1@domain.com
abc.abc@domain.com
abc_41.15768@domain.com
12345@domain.com
12.12.23@domain.com
ABC.ABC.ABC.ABC0046@domain.com
abc_123_4595@domain.com
abc@asdas.co.in
abc@insta123.com
abc@inta.co.in

Non-Acceptable
---------------
abc@@insta.com.com.com
abc@insta..com
abc@insta%.com
abc@insta/.com
abc@insta\.com
abc..abc@domain.com 
abc__abc@domain.com
abc.@insta.com
abc..de@insta.com
abc-@insta.com
abc-def@insta.com
abc+@insta.com
abc123..45@insta.com
abc%@insta.com
abc\@insta.com
abc/@insta.com
abc@insta-.com
ABC.ABC.ABC.ABC0046@domain.com.com.com
author: jeevesh
